title: RESERVED
content:
Ord. No. 20190822-117, ยง 52, effective September 1, 2019, repealed ยง 30-2-55, which pertained to notice
and derived from City Code Section 25-4-55; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.

(A)

The single office shall promptly deliver a copy of an application for preliminary
plan approval to each reviewing department or agency after the application is filed.

(B)

A reviewing department or agency shall prepare and deliver to the single office a
written report of comments and recommendations regarding an application for preliminary
plan approval before the expiration of the staff review period described in this section.

(C)

Staff review period for an application for preliminary plan approval is established
by the director by administrative rule.

(D)

An applicant may file with the single office an update to an application for preliminary
plan approval before expiration of the application.

(E)

The staff review period of an update to an application for preliminary plan approval
is established by the director by administrative rule.

Source: City Code Section 25-4-56; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42; Ord. 20050929-079;
